summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: BJÖRN HALL Nurse Headband with Buttons for Face Mask | Elastic Swimsuit Material, Smooth & Stretchy | Ear Saver Headband with Buttons | Perfect for Nurses, Doctors & Medical Students
Review Date: 2020/09/15
Store: Björn Hall
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '5.4 x 4.9 x 0.5 inches; 0.81 Ounces'}
Review Text: I am a nurse and use headbands constantly since COVID has taken over. I love that it keeps my hair out of the way when dealing with my patients, and that I can attach my mask to the buttons to save my poor ears from rubbing raw after a long shift. Highly recommend.
Review Title: Great headband
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Ice Roller for Face & Eye by Charmlily, Puffiness, Migraine, Pain Relief - Cold Facial Massager Treatment to Reduce Puffy Face & Tighten Pores, Under Eye Wrinkles (Blue)
Review Date: 2020/10/30
Store: CHARMLILY
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'CHARMLILY', 'Special Feature': 'Heat', 'Is Cordless?': 'Yes', 'Product Grade': 'Home', 'Style': 'Rustic', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.91 x 3.54 x 2.44 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '679360114261', 'Manufacturer': 'CHARMLILY'}
Review Text: This is so easy to use. Just place the removable roller in freezer for 10 mins and you're ready to go. Feels great on your face and neck. Helps with my headaches and feels great!!
Review Title: Great Product
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: [Marshique] Patented Eyelash Dryer - Extension & Lift/Perm Care Mascara Dry No Damage Curl USB Rechargeable
Review Date: 2020/11/15
Store: Marshique
Average Rating: 2.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Marshique', 'Handle Type': 'Massage Handle', 'Operation Mode': 'Automatic'}
Review Text: This is very easy to use. It heats up instantly. The rubber on it does not get hot enough to burn you or your lashes. The air that blows out is warm. Helps give me that lift of my lashes without ruining the rest of my eyelid make up.
Review Title: Great product.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: AMOREPACIFIC Color Control Cushion Compact Broad Spectrum SPF 50+
Review Date: 2020/12/28
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Color': '208 Medium Yellow', 'Skin Type': 'Normal', 'Finish Type': 'Hydration', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Professional Skin Care', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '8 x 5 x 5 inches; 1.05 Ounces', 'Item model number': '270330597', 'Manufacturer': 'AmazonUs/4O2O3', 'Country of Origin': 'Korea, Republic of', 'Domestic Shipping': 'Item can be shipped within U.S.', 'International Shipping': 'This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.  Learn More'}
Review Text: This make up is too watered down. It has little to no coverage. It is hard to blend. Disappointed
Review Title: Not what I expected
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Topwon 4.5Inch Makeup Remover Pads Washable Cotton Face Cleansing Pad for Sensitive Skin 3 Packs Facial Washing Puffs to Remove Mascara Foundation Lipstick
Review Date: 2021/03/17
Store: Topwon
Product Description: ['Make up removal pads are easily exfoliating and remove all makeup, creams, sunscreen & cosmetics when wet.It can be facial makeup cleansing towel, eye makeup remover cloths, foundation make-up remover wipes, lipstick removing cleaning puff. Compact size is easy for travel or camping A ecofriendly makeup removing solution for you and the environment Makeup removal pads and facial cleaning puffs Cotton fleece washing face cloth pad with inner sponge Perfect for washing with only water or facial cleanser to help people cleaning face, makeup remove Washable pad we recommend wash with soap each time after use Size: 4.5Inch*0.8Inch,Please choose your order quantity']
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Topwon', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable', 'Unit Count': '3.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '3', 'Package Dimensions': '6.37 x 5.51 x 2.44 inches; 0.95 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'HHA1104', 'Manufacturer': 'Topwon'}
Review Text: These face cleaning pads are great. They are soft, thick and easy to use. They are the perfect size for your hand to hold and wring out water while washing your face. Great purchase!
Review Title: Love These
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: YERMA Makeup Face Primer with Brush - Instant Brightening and Whitening, Minimize Pores and Fine Lines, Natural Ingredients Moisturizing Primer for All Skin Types, Illuminate and smooth skin surface
Review Date: 2021/10/06
Store: Yerma
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Yerma', 'Product Benefits': 'Whitening', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '6.34 x 5.08 x 1.14 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '728886787418'}
Review Text: This primer does what it says in the description.  It does smooth, lighten and brighten your skin. It is easy to apply and blends into the skin well.
Review Title: Lightens
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Peripera Ink Mood Matte Lipstick, Lightweight, Matte, Smooth, Hydrating, Lasting Color Payoff (02 Pink Go Up)
Review Date: 2021/11/06
Store: Peripera
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Peripera', 'Color': '02 PINK GO UP', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Item Form': 'Crayon', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Package Dimensions': '3.46 x 0.94 x 0.87 inches; 1.06 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'CLIO'}
Review Text: I ordered the nude. This is moisturizing and doesn't dry out your lips. The color is beautiful. Highly recommend.
Review Title: Great lipstick
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Eyebrow Stamp Stencil Kit 2 Colors Waterproof and Long Lasting One Step Easy Color Brow Stamp with 24 Eyebrow Stencils, 1 Brush and 1 Razor, Dark Brown and Light Brown
Review Date: 2021/11/20
Store: Marine Forest
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Marine Forest', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting', 'Product Dimensions': '4.65 x 0.67 x 0.67 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'ES7010-2brown', 'UPC': '762403888318'}
Review Text: This is very cheap and chalky looking.  It's fast to apply,  but is so powdery and fake looking.  My family laughed at me after I applied it. I'll stick to my regular stuff.
Review Title: Cheap
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Nose Pore Wax Strips for hair removal
Review Date: 2022/02/19
Store: GLAMOR VALLEY
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Scars, Dark Spots, Acne, Uneven Skin Tone, Inflammation', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone,All Skin Types', 'Brand': 'GLAMOR VALLEY', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisture', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 1.97 x 1.97 inches; 6.74 Ounces'}
Review Text: This dark spot cream is almost like a Vaseline or Aquaphor consistency. The smell is pretty neutral. It is easily spread and absorbed into the skin. I noticed a hint of lightening on some sun spots within a week or so. This will work if you are consistent with using it.
Review Title: I like this!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step:

    1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments
    2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases
    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns
    4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences

    Remember to:

raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The purchase history reveals a preference for practical, quality-driven products that enhance personal well-being and appearance, primarily in the beauty and healthcare categories. The individual consistently rates essential items, such as headbands for professional use and facial care tools, with high satisfaction. Common themes include a focus on functionality (e.g., ear savers for long working hours, easy-to-use facial massagers), signaling a need for convenience in their busy lifestyle.

In terms of quality preferences, the user favors products that offer effective results, as shown by the high ratings on functional items like makeup removers and lip care. However, this individual is price-sensitive regarding cosmetics, as evidenced by their dissatisfaction with underperforming products like a poorly rated makeup compact and eyebrow stencils described as cheap and ineffective.

Overall, the core preferences indicate a strong inclination toward practical functionality and quality efficacy in products, with a notable willingness to pay for items that meet their professional and personal grooming needs while maintaining a discerning attitude towards value and effectiveness.

target_interaction.title: Good quality
target_interaction.text: This is a nice quality serum to apply under the eyes especially in the morning when tired.  Easy to apply and absorbs well into the skin. Not too drying.
target_interaction.title_meta: So'Bio Étic | Anti-Fatigue Smoothing Eye Contour | Organic Eye Cream for Brightening & Plumping Under Eye Bags, Dark Circles, Wrinkles & Anti-Aging | 0.51 fl oz

videos.title: Feels so nice going on, helps my tired eyes.
